title: The Confident learner: self-esteem in children (TEFC)
creator_credit: Thomas W. Gregroy and Lawren Productions
brief_description: Shows how the teacher can create conditions whereby a child can learn to build a self image of competence, a willingness to take risks, an ability to deal with mistakes, and self motivation.
